name: homecoming.city
body:
# Welcome Home.

## Watch this space. Coming in October 2016.

## **_What is homecoming.city?_**
homecoming.city is a media agency harnessing a humble but global network of passionate wordsmiths and creatives. 

We specialise in conceptualising and actualising creative, quality media content; we pride ourselves on delivering ethical longform media content that is targeted at achieving a higher degree of social good.

Basically, if you want something creative taken from concept to reality, come to us – let us help you realise this vision. 

No frills, no drivel, full transparency. Let’s create something great together. 

We invite you to share your ideas, thoughts, and opinions at: [team@homecoming.city](mailto:team@homecoming.city?subject=Hello homecoming)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
